member.summary: Defines a list of well-known distance functions that can be used to compare vectors.

member.summary: The cosine (angular) similarity between two vectors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.DistanceFunction.CosineSimilarity
member.summary: The cosine (angular) similarity between two vectors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.DistanceFunction.DotProductSimilarity
member.summary: Measures both the length and angle between two vectors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.DistanceFunction.EuclideanDistance
member.summary: Measures the Euclidean distance between two vectors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.DistanceFunction.EuclideanSquaredDistance
member.summary: Measures the Euclidean squared distance between two vectors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.DistanceFunction.Hamming
member.summary: The number of differences between vectors at each dimensions.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.DistanceFunction.ManhattanDistance
member.summary: Measures the Manhattan distance between two vectors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.DistanceFunction.NegativeDotProductSimilarity
member.summary: Measures both the length and angle between two vectors.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1
member.summary: Options for hybrid search when using a dense vector and string keywords to do the search.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1.AdditionalProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional target property to do the text/keyword search on. The property must have full text search enabled. If not provided will look if there is a text property with full text search enabled, and will throw if either none or multiple exist.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1.Filter
member.summary: Gets or sets a search filter to use before doing the vector search.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1.IncludeTotalCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the total count should be included in the results.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1.IncludeVectors
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to include vectors in the retrieval result.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1.OldFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets a search filter to use before doing the hybrid search.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1.Skip
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of results to skip before returning results, i.e. the index of the first result to return.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of results to return.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.HybridSearchOptions`1.VectorProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the target dense vector property to search on. Only needs to be set when the collection has multiple vector properties.
member.returns: If not provided will check if there is a vector property to use by default, and will throw if either none or multiple exist.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.IKeywordHybridSearch`1
member.summary: Contains a method for doing a hybrid search using a vector and keywords.
member.typeparam: The record data model to use for retrieving data from the store.

member.summary: Performs a hybrid search for records that match the given embedding and keywords, after applying the provided filters.
member.param: The vector to search the store with.
A collection of keywords to search the store with.
The options that control the behavior of the search.
The to monitor for cancellation requests. The default is .
member.returns: The records found by the hybrid search, including their result scores.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.IndexKind
member.summary: Defines a list of well-known index types that can be used to index vectors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.IndexKind.DiskAnn
member.summary: Disk-based Approximate Nearest Neighbor algorithm designed for efficiently searching for approximate nearest neighbors (ANN) in high-dimensional spaces.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.IndexKind.Dynamic
member.summary: Dynamic index allows to automatically switch from to indexes.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.IndexKind.Flat
member.summary: Brute force search to find the nearest neighbors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.IndexKind.Hnsw
member.summary: Hierarchical Navigable Small World, which performs an approximate nearest neighbour (ANN) search.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.IndexKind.IvfFlat
member.summary: Inverted File with Flat Compression.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.IndexKind.QuantizedFlat
member.summary: Index that compresses vectors using DiskANN-based quantization methods for better efficiency in the kNN search.

member.summary: Contains a method for doing a vector search using text that will be vectorized downstream.
